name: Poppunch Maze Challenge
description:
Huggy vs Workers - No matter who you are? 
Be sure you are the last remaining in this poppy game!

Two modes for you to choose:
Become the Huggy Wuggy and go hunt the workers or Become the a worker and runaway from the creepy Huggy Wuggy.
But be quick, you don't have much time!
Be alert and hide or seek as fast as possible so you don't have to start over.

GAME FEATURE:
- Easy to play with just one finger: Seek your preys, hide yourself!
- Two playing modes: Hide or Seek.
- Endless levels with lots of fun.
- Thrilling time-limited gameplays.

It's hide n seek playtime with Huggy Wuggy and workers. 
Join the unique game right now and experience full package of fun!

What are you waiting for?
DOWNLOAD THIS FREE Huggy Maze is Hide 'N Seek Playtime Mode!
